Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the significance of Florida's campaign contribution limit by stating that it is the second-lowest in the entire country.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that increasing the campaign contribution limit will make Florida's campaign finance system more transparent, without providing evidence or support for this assumption.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence or data to support the statement that Florida has the second-lowest campaign contribution limit in the entire country. It only refers to the statement made by Florida House Speaker Will Weatherford.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations or factors that may contribute to the effectiveness or transparency of a campaign finance system, other than the contribution limit.
